Name: Roxroria: An Island Of Treasures
About the game: Game Theme The Roxroria Game is based on an attempt to improve certain cognitive functions for young minds! Pattern identification and isolation in the form of puzzle Hide and seek objects Attention in a disturbing environment Short term memory exercise Game Story In 2110 CE, an unpopulated island is discovered in Indian Ocean. It is later named as “Roxroria”, an island of rocks. The island is drifted away from African sub-continent slowly due to plate tectonics theory, over few thousands of years. The island is believed to have giant black Spiders guarding a lot of golden treasures. Long ago, those were stolen from the Sanctum Chest by the pirates. And concealed inside Spider eggs, hidden underground over a pool ball game named as “Odd One Out”. Usually, these Spiders are non-venomous. However, it can chase and attack its enemy. They lay eggs all around the places and can sense its enemy only in the front. The Spiders have microchip implanted in their body to get access to Sanctum Chest through wireless signals. The pirates have left the island for raiding in the summer. It’s the right time for you to unlock and rediscover the treasures in the island. Be happy to revert them back to the Sanctum Chest. Challenge the Spiders that may attack you. Use weapons to scare them away. Break the Spider eggs to reduce the menace. Capture all alive Spiders in the prison after all treasures are back to Sanctum Chest. Explore the island, until the pirates have back home. Have Fun!
